div.head: Velvets and blacks
div.ab: One needs needs to make thee middle main layer very d dark, & its folds & highlights very bright with white, & on the edges ofu its light, you make a white line. For blue & green velvets, you highlight touch the shading with peach pit black, which is very black. For lake, black of pit coal which makes a reddish black on lake for velvets. The common charcoal makes a whitish black.
